name: ENDUSER
description:
ENDUSER is a short text adventure about a person (you) living a day of their life. You wake up in your room with your stomach rumbling. You task is to stumble your way into tomorrow.

Features

  • A depressingly ordinary world filled with self loathing humour
  • A cumbersome and awkward command parser
  • Immersive audio landscape and soundtrack that reacts to your actions
  • Multiple endings

    • "ENDUSER is well written, and its balance of humour, self loathing and a familiar-but-odd view of its world makes for a delightfully surreal experience."

    - Cheeseness (@ValiantCheese)

ENDUSER was written for Linux Game Jam 2018 with the theme of "Versatile Verbs" by a team of three Finns: Samsai, Tumocs and Tuubi. Initial engine, artwork (SFX, music, logo) and story by Tumocs. Coding and extra writing by Samsai and Tuubi.

ENDUSER: Rebotched

The "Rebotched Edition" improves upon the version that was released for the game jam by improving the parser with tab-completion and singular/plural aliases for certain words, fixes a number of bugs and introduces an all new, alternative terminal user interface based on an initial implementation by Ysblokje.

Source code available here: https://gitlab.com/silly-linux-game-jam2018-game/pydler
